rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: It is too early to tell how many doses Moderna will be able to manufacture, said Robert Johnson, director of the medical countermeasures program at HHS, on the call.

rationale: The segment discusses manufacturing capacity factually, lacking high-potency framing.
